description: Tags a resource with a map of key and value pairs.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource that you want to tag.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A map of key and value pairs to use to tag your resource. (string) --- Unique tag key, maximum 128 Unicode characters in UTF-8 (string) --- Tag value, maximum 256 Unicode characters in UTF-8
